title: Pill popping on a grand scale
text:
What: An exhibition of 15 works by "pop artist for the 21st century" Coady.

Coady's work uses recognisable shapes with smooth shiny surfaces to appeal to viewers in the same way marketeers of consumer goods attract purchasers.

Primary Instinct 2019 Coady

The large works in her newest series feature medications and expands on her earlier work using pills as an encapsulation of our vices.

A vivid palette of reds, yellows, blues and greens evokes childhood and our conditioning as we grow up.

“Primary Instincts peels back the layers of addiction, tying our dependency on medication to the manipulation of our most basic needs, security, comfort and control,” says Lisa Fehily, director of the Finkelstein Gallery.
description: Pop artist Coady peels back the layers of addiction.
